name: DefenceGame
description:
2DTowerDefenceGame.

Defend your Tower.

You can build Weapon by paying.

You can earn Gold when you beat enemies.

Weapons

  • Cannon

Long Ranged attack

  • Solider

Short Ranged attack. but, you can place Solider.

Command Place or Click to Solider. and drag placement.

  • Missile

Area of effect.but Shot interval is  long .

Weapon Menu

  • Upgrade

Weapon power up

  • Recover

Weapon is recoverd.  you can earn Gold.

Last wave is a little difficult.
